record.field: Novergy Proposal for High Efficiency Solar PV system capacity {{ (object.kw or 'n/a') }} KW

div.p:
Dear Mr.
Greetings from Novergy Solar!!
With reference to your discussion with our team.
A) We are pleased to submit our offer for SOLAR PV SYSTEM for your plant.
In our offer we are submitting proposal for two options as follows.
Option - 1 : 400 kw capacity solar power system (With poly crystalline technology modules) Option - 2 : 620 kw capacity solar power system (With very HIGH EFFICIENCY LATEST SOLAR TWIN CELL MODULES).
You can choose the option which suits your requirement.
B) Some key highlights :
In our option - 2 proposal we are using our Latest and advanced TWIN CELL MONO PERC technology . Please note by using our twin-cell technology modules, we are pleased to inform you that we are able to install a HIGHER capacity system on limited available space.
We have also included all relevant associated work such as fixing of structure, liasoning, etc.in both options.
We follow best global safety practices while executing any project.
C) Some Highlights of our Solar Twin-Cell Technology:
1. Generates more solar power in lesser space.
2. Effect of dust effect is less as compared to normal modules.
3. Special Nano-coated surface of glass to have anti-reflection properties and better solar absorption.
4. The twin section reduces internal resistance and ensures continuous production of energy when partially shaded.
5. Having Low temperature Co-efficient (hence more suited to Indian tropical conditions with higher temperatures).
6. Having MBB technology
7. PERC technology
8. Minimizes micro-cracks.
D) Please watch a short video on our this technology :-
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v3CDEWcnRNQ
Please feel free to contact us if you have any queries.
We look forward to your favourable response as we are confident that once you use Novergy product you will be highly satisfied with the performance.
